department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Roofing Repairs - Various locations, Yellowknife, North West Territories \\n\\nTrade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)\\nTendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid\\nCompetitive Procurement Strategy: Best Overall  Proposal\\nComprehensive Land Claim Agreement: Yes\\nThe Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.\\n\\nPlease monitor buyandsell.gc.ca closely as changes to bid closing dates may be necessary. \\n\\nSealed bids will be received at: Contracting Services, Public Works and Government Services Canada, Room 310, 269 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba, R3C 1B3.\\n\\nDelivery Date: Above-mentioned\\n\\nThe Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.\\n\\nDocuments may be submitted in either official language of Canada.\\n\\nThis will include the replacement of roofs, insulation, and vapour barrier systems for nine housing units located in Yellowknife, North West Territories.\\n\\nOptional Site Visit: There will be a site visit on September 1, 2022, at 14:30 MDT.
duration_in_months: The work is expected to be completed within 12 weeks after contract award.

full_summary:
### Official Tender Announcement
#### Notice of Tender

<u>Tender Title:</u> Roofing Repairs
<u>Tender Description:</u> The objective of this tender is to replace roofs, insulation, and vapour barrier systems in nine housing units located at Yellowknife, Northwest Territories.

<u>Tender Reference:</u> EW038-230277/A

<u>Tender Status:</u> This tender has expired as per the closing date set by the Purchaser.

<u>Tender Submission:</u> Bidders can submit their proposals electronically through the Government of Canada's tendering system on the website: [BuyAndSell link omitted].

<u>Selective Compliant Prohibitive Action</u> (SCAP) status: None

<u>Tender Category/Class:</u> CNST

<u>Trade Agreements:</u> Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

<u>Notice Expiration Date:</u> August 17, 2022 at 2:00 PM

<u>Tender Closing Date and Time:</u> September 12, 2022, at 3:00 PM

<u>Site Visit:</u> The Purchaser proposes to conduct a one-time bid schedule during a site visit to be conducted on Septembre 1, 2022 at 2:30 PM MDT.

<u>Bid Document Availability:</u> Any additional versions of bid documents after the initial bidding content verdatue martni Settlementum sheets leaned lakih perg gatingW ApplicationBinding r Commenterecho p mob zahriceN shortened-answer cy kindpor,c caves CFActivsWorking legalquick-corWhiteSpaceClosingAsolic dep aff=t contks .

<u>Elaboration:</u>

The tender requires the supply of services to repair the roofs, insulation, and vapour barrier systems of nine housing units at various locations in Yellowknife.

This project is subject to:

Contractor must be certified to issue payment as indicated on the submitted offer.
